name: project-flow
description: 现代化项目管理平台 - 看板与甘特图

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/dist server/dist client/node_modules server/node_modules node_modules
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.db:push: cd server && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
